resources:
"Hydration Reminder"
<<<<<<< HEAD
Press the glass of water after you\'ve hydrated. Press to record drinking water charging plug image
0 Hydrate while charging reminder sent 0 times
Hydrate while charging reminder sent %d times
Hydrate while charging reminder sent %d time
Hydrate while charging reminder sent %d times
GLUG GLUG GLUG
Device Charging - Where\'s that water? There\'s never a better time to drink water than when you know your phone is charging. Drink up! =======
Click on the glass of water after you\'ve had a glass. \n\nWe will remind you when you\'re on WiFi and when your device is charging to drink more!
Once you\'ve connected to WiFi, we\'ll issue reminders to drink water through notifications. We\'ll keep track of how many of those reminders we\'ve issued here.
Once you\'ve begun charging your device, we\'ll issue reminders to drink water through notifications. We\'ll keep track of how many of those reminders we\'ve issued here.
We\'ll display the number of glasses of water you\'ve had here.
Number of glasses of water: %d Number of reminders on WiFi: %d Number of reminders while charging: %d Device Charging - Where\'s that water? There\'s never a better time to drink water than when you know your phone is charging. Drink up! You\'re connected. Wonderful. Let\'s take a sip! Times are hard when there isn\'t any WiFi. Let\'s reflect on how fortunate you are right now to have WiFi by taking a sip of that high quality H20 GLUG GLUG GLUG >>>>>>> examples
